title: Ping Issue
body: Ever since a about a week ago, my latency has increased to 130-180 ms from a constant 32. Nothing has changed since then in terms of my internet and i was just wondering why this might be happening and any advice i could get

replies.body:
Hi Occidere

That sounds pretty strange.  If nothing has changed on your own network it might be an ISP issue.

I'd suggest you run a [trace route to the OCE server](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) as your first step, and you could also look at the support page on [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know how you go

Cheers
Mindstar
